lead_paragraph: Portugal's coach Fernando Santos will leave his final decision on team selection for the quarter-final clash against Poland until Thursday morning because of injuries to at least two players, he told reporters.

headline.print_headline: Portugal Sweating on Injuries Ahead of Poland Clash
headline.main: Portugal Sweating on Injuries Ahead of Poland Clash
